Managing Social Distancing in an Open Society

Jun 18, 2020

Here is a talk I gave about our work on monitor social distancing at the county/city/campus level.

The first half of the work is part of the COVID-19 Mobility Data Network, and is collaboration with with the Dan Larremore at CU and Bailey Fosdick at CSU.

Code and details about the first 1/2 of the talk can be found at our github repo.
